Social Distancing.description: Measures taken to reduce physical proximity between people

Reduced Contact Rate.description: Decreased frequency of close interactions between individuals

Economic Impact.description: Consequences of social distancing on the economy

Lower Infection Rate.description: Lower transmission rates of infectious diseases

Increased Mental Health Concerns.description: Negative psychological effects of reduced social interaction

Business Closures.description: Temporary or permanent closure of businesses

Unemployment.description: Loss of employment due to economic downturn

Reduced Strain on Healthcare System.description: Less burden on hospitals and medical staff

Social Isolation.description: Feeling of separation and disconnect from others

Increased Anxiety.description: Elevated levels of worry and unease

Job Losses.description: Loss of employment leading to various hardships

Improved Patient Outcomes.description: Positive effects on patient health and recovery

Increased Healthcare Capacity.description: Improved ability of healthcare systems to handle future crises

Fewer Deaths.description: Lower number of deaths due to the pandemic

Longer Pandemic Duration.description: Extended period of pandemic impacting various aspects of life

Loneliness.description: Feeling of isolation and lack of connection

Depression.description: Persistent sadness and loss of interest

Bankruptcies.description: Businesses forced to close due to financial difficulties

Reduced Investment.description: Decreased funding and investment in businesses

Food Insecurity.description: Lack of access to sufficient and nutritious food

Increased Survival Rates.description: Higher percentage of people surviving the illness

Better Healthcare Access.description: Improved availability and accessibility of healthcare services

Better Preparedness for Future Outbreaks.description: Improved ability to respond to future pandemics

Improved Resource Allocation.description: More efficient distribution of healthcare resources

Improved Public Health.description: Overall improvement in public health outcomes

Prolonged Social Disruption.description: Extended period of social and community disruption
